name: @emeks/antd-custom-theme-generator
description: [Ant Design](https://ant.design/) provides plenty of UI components, styled with [less](http://lesscss.org/). You can customize the default theme modifying less variable, to achive this you have multiple ways ([check the doc here](https://ant.design/docs/react/customize-theme)). The problem is that you don't have a simple way to create a static `css` file with zero configuration.
author: granujas
